oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Student's Indecent Retort to the Hoca.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Archive of Turkish Oral Narrative (Texas Tech University)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Uysal, Ahmet Edip.
Walker, Warren S.
Walker, Barbara K.
Texas Tech University. Archive of Turkish Oral Narrative.
Folklore--Turkey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two page transcript of Turkish oral narrative story No. 639 titled "The Student's Indecent Retort to the Hoca." The folktale was narrated on January 8, 1974 and is part of the Archive of Turkish Oral Narrative.

Oral narrative of a Turkish folktale collected by Professor Ahmet Edip Uysal, Dr. Waren Walker and Barbara Walker (Mrs. Warren Walker). Each narrative was translated into English by native Turkish speakers (mostly students), paid for by the Walkers, who then edited the translations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: The images in this collection are for study purposes, teaching, classroom projection and research only.
